meanings.definition: The act of bringing something to an end.
meanings.sent1: The stopping of the movie surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The train made a sudden stopping at the station.
meanings.sent3: The stopping of the music made the party feel awkward.
meanings.sent4: The stopping of the rain brought out a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The stopping of the clock signaled the end of the game.

meanings.definition: A place where something comes to an end.
meanings.sent1: The road's stopping was marked by a large sign.
meanings.sent2: The river's stopping was a beautiful waterfall.
meanings.sent3: The stopping of the sidewalk led to a dead end.
meanings.sent4: The stopping of the trail revealed a stunning view.
meanings.sent5: The stopping of the path was where the forest began.

meanings.definition: The action of preventing something from happening.
meanings.sent1: The stopping of the thief was swift by the security guard.
meanings.sent2: The stopping of the fire saved the building from damage.
meanings.sent3: The stopping of the dog from barking made the neighborhood quiet.
meanings.sent4: The stopping of the leak prevented a flood in the house.
meanings.sent5: The stopping of the argument avoided further conflict.
